content.prompt: Which of the following statements would an abolitionist claim supported the ideas expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: Southern states had the authority to restrict free African Americans from owning firearms.
The immorality of slavery had a widespread corrupting effect on Southern culture.
The Constitution held that enslaved people were legally considered property.
Southern interests depended on the labor of enslaved people, while the contributions of poor White citizens were minimal.

topic.text: 4.12: African Americans in the Early Republic
